snapshot.blocks.big-bang-freedom.copy.body: Get the aesthetic instantly. Trending designs or evergreen classics. Then customize without limits—per-corner radius, per-side shadows, per-role typography, and responsive breakpoints. A template that becomes your signature.
snapshot.blocks.big-bang-freedom.copy.headline: Start with a design. Then make it yours.
snapshot.blocks.cta-templates.copy.headline: Create a free FAQ widget
snapshot.blocks.cta-templates.copy.subheadline: Start with a design template or build from scratch. Total creative control.

snapshot.blocks.hero.copy.subheadline: Beautiful by default. Unmistakably yours by design.

snapshot.blocks.split-2026-trends.copy.headline: Bold when you need it
snapshot.blocks.split-2026-trends.copy.subheadlin: Glassmorphism, liquid glass, neumorphism—trend-forward looks in light and dark.
snapshot.blocks.split-appearance.copy.headline: Appearance control without limits
snapshot.blocks.split-appearance.copy.subheadline: Per-corner radius. Borders with custom colors. Shadows outside and inside (linked or independent per-side). Gradient, image, or video backgrounds. Total visual authority.
snapshot.blocks.split-dark.copy.headline: Dark mode: sophisticated and modern
snapshot.blocks.split-dark.copy.subheadline: Modern interfaces thrive in darkness. Premium feel with cutting-edge aesthetics. Included with every template.
snapshot.blocks.split-evergreen-styles.copy.subhe: Minimal, clean, and modern. Timeless styles that always feel current.
snapshot.blocks.split-layouts.copy.headline: Three layout engines for your FAQ widget
snapshot.blocks.split-layouts.copy.subheadline: Accordion for progressive reveal. List for simplicity. Cards for visual hierarchy. Grid or masonry. Responsive columns. Granular control over gaps and padding.
snapshot.blocks.split-responsive.copy.headline: Desktop and mobile, perfectly tuned
snapshot.blocks.split-responsive.copy.subheadline: Your FAQ widget responds to every breakpoint. Different column counts, padding, spacing per device. One design language, infinite viewports.
snapshot.blocks.split-typography.copy.headline: Typography precision
snapshot.blocks.split-typography.copy.subheadline: Six distinct roles (headline, body, question, answer, button, section). Choose from 17 Google Fonts. Weight, style, size—all customizable per role. Dynamic scales.
Many layout systems, not one. Per-breakpoint structure. Independent desktop/mobile padding and spacing. Control columns, stacking, alignment, and reflow—exactly.
Per-corner radius. Borders with custom colors. Shadows outside and inside (linked or independent per-side). Gradient, image, or video backgrounds. Total visual authority.
Six distinct roles (headline, body, question, answer, button, section). Choose from 17 Google Fonts. Weight, style, size—all customizable per role. Dynamic scales.
